text:
NAEB PLACEMENT SERVICE
The following are descriptions of individuals recently registered with
us. Further information concerning them may be obtained by writing
Mrs. Judith Stevens, Placement Officer, 14 Gregory Hall, Urbana,
Illinois. Also, anyone interested in registering with us should con¬
tact Mrs. Stevens.
December 1 - Male, 22, B.S., married, at present supervisor of
radio-TV production for a small college, desires position as news
director, production manager or special-events producer in educa¬
tional broadcasting. Can also shoot, edit, and plan films, has ex¬
perience with news, programming and writing. Desires locate in the
East. $5 00/month.
December 2 - Program manager for commercial TV station with 7 years
experience as producer-director and administrator as well as program
manager, wants to be station manager of an ETV station. Male, 32,
A.B., married. Location open, $9,500.
December 3 - Male, 30, married, presently employed as mainten¬
ance supervisor at an ETV station-has also worked as an audio en¬
gineer and trained many student engineers. Wants a position as audio
or video engineer, can work on kinescopes and operations. Location,
salary, open.
December 4 - Recent radio-TV graduate, now production assistant
in an ETV station wants similar position in another station, as a cut¬
back in operations threatens job security. Can direct and announce.
Male, 22, B.A., married. Location open. $350/month.
December 5 - Male, 26, married, to receive M.S. in radio-TV in
February, wishes a position as producer-director, production dir¬
ector, or program manager in an ETV station. Will go anywhere but
South. $4,500.
